definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: In telephone surveys, interviewers have close relation to refusal rates.
sentences.chinese: 在電話調查中，訪員因素對拒訪率有着重要的影響。

sentences.english: Face to face interview was conducted by trained personnel.
sentences.chinese: 資料收集是以訓練過的訪員採面談方式進行。
